passes.description: Ensures ARIA attributes are allowed for an element's role
passes.help: Elements must only use allowed ARIA attributes

any.message: ARIA attributes are used correctly for the defined role

passes.description: Ensures role attribute has an appropriate value for the element
passes.help: ARIA role should be appropriate for the element

any.message: ARIA role is allowed for given element

passes.description: Ensures every ARIA button, link and menuitem has an accessible name
passes.help: ARIA commands must have an accessible name

any.message: Element has text that is visible to screen readers

passes.description: Ensures aria-hidden='true' is not present on the document body.
passes.help: aria-hidden='true' must not be present on the document body

any.message: No aria-hidden attribute is present on document body

passes.help: ARIA hidden element must not be focusable or contain focusable elements

all.message: No focusable elements while a modal is open
No focusable elements contained within element
No focusable elements contained within element
